  • Type Parameters:
    VALUE - is the generic type of the value.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    AttributeReadAriaRole, AttributeReadEnabled, AttributeReadHtmlId, AttributeReadMode, AttributeReadModeFixed, AttributeReadModified, AttributeReadPrimaryStyle, AttributeReadStyles, AttributeReadStylesAdvanced, AttributeReadTooltip, AttributeReadValueAdvanced<VALUE>, AttributeReadVisible, AttributeReadVisibleRecursive, AttributeWriteEnabled, AttributeWriteHtmlId, AttributeWriteMode, AttributeWriteModeFixed, AttributeWriteModified, AttributeWriteOnlyFocused, AttributeWritePrimaryStyle, AttributeWriteStyles, AttributeWriteStylesAdvanced, AttributeWriteTooltip, AttributeWriteValueAdvanced<VALUE>, AttributeWriteVisible, AttributeWriteVisibleAdvanced, UiFeature, UiFeatureEvent, UiFeatureMessages, UiFeatureMode, UiFeatureValidation<VALUE>, UiFeatureValue<VALUE>, UiFeatureValueAndValidation<VALUE>, UiWidget, UiWidgetAbstractComposite, UiWidgetAbstractWithValue<VALUE>, UiWidgetComposite<UiWidgetRegular>, UiWidgetRegular, UiWidgetWithValue<VALUE>, AttributeReadDisposed, AttributeReadId<String>, AttributeReadValue<VALUE>, AttributeWriteDisposed, AttributeWriteId<String>, AttributeWriteValue<VALUE>, Accessibility, AbstractValidatableObject, HasValueValidators<VALUE>, ValidatableObject<VALUE>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    UiWidgetCustomFormEditor

    public abstract class UiWidgetCustomEditor<VALUE>
extends UiWidgetCustomComposite<VALUE,UiWidgetRegular,UiWidgetVerticalPanel>
    This is the abstract base class for a custom composite widget that implements the UI pattern editor. It supports viewing a composite value (an entity or business object). It has a button panel with an "Edit"-Button that switches to the edit-mode. In edit-mode the user can modify the object and finally save his changes by pressing a "Save"-Button. This will check for modifications, trigger validation and create a new instance of the value object with the current modifications that is saved by delegation to the UiHandlerObjectSave.onSave(Object, UiEvent) on widgets for UI patterns or forms to edit business objects (see UiWidgetCustomComposite.doGetValue(Object, ValidationState) and UiWidgetCustomComposite.doSetValue(Object, boolean)).
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Joerg Hohwiller (hohwille at users.sourceforge.net)

      • addChild

        protected void addChild(UiWidgetRegular child)
        This method adds a new child. It should be called from the constructor or from doInitialize() before the super call. Otherwise the child may appear after the button panel.
        Parameters:
        child - is the UiWidgetRegular to add as child.
        See Also:
        UiWidgetDynamicComposite.addChild(net.sf.mmm.client.ui.api.widget.UiWidget)
